name: Barber Hero Hair-dresser Salon: Shave Clip & Trim
name_original: Barber Hero Hair-dresser Salon: Shave Clip & Trim
description:
Cut, style, shampoo and colour your way to success with Barber Hero!

From the makers of Streetfood Tycoon comes an all new fun and challenging time management and strategy game. Do you have what it takes to run your own Barber Shop? If you love Streetfood Tycoon, you'll love Barber Hero even more!

Key Features:

- Manage your own Barber Shop
- Cut, shampoo, style and colour the hair of your customers
- Unlock upgrades and tools for your Barber Shop
- Unlock skills for your character
- Unlock all 10 stars!
- Meet tons of funny characters
- Unlock spoofed celebrities
- Fun and cartoony graphics
- Guaranteed fun for the entire family!

Grab Barber Hero now--it's totally FREE!

PLEASE NOTE: Barber Hero is completely FREE-TO-PLAY but some game items can also be purchased using real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings. Barber Hero DOES NOT require an internet connection to play.
